pages.title: The Gods Shall Provide
pages.text: Oh boy, It's time to hang out with the $(item)Old Gods$() again, I love them so much (Play along they might be listening). Better roll up those sleeves and expose your veins because it's fricking ritual time!$(br2)A common ritual is called the $(item)Ritual of Magnetism$() and it will allow us to pull ores that are situated under the $(l:sim_3/resources/1_minerals_and_ores#barrier)Barrier$().

The setup to properly mine the $(item)Ores$() under the $(l:sim_3/resources/1_minerals_and_ores#barrier)Barrier$() has a few vital components.$(br2)1. A $(item)Ritual of Magnetism$() to retrieve the ores.$(br)2. Some sort of $(l:sim_3/helpful_stuff#protector)Block Protector$() that shields the ritual from explosions.$(br)3. A mechanism that drops activated $(item)TNT$() on the retrieved ores.$(br)4. Some means of $(item)item collection$() for the dust of the exploded ores.
A $(item)Ritual Diviner$() can be used to automatically set up rituals. It's highly recommended you use it instead of manually drawing on the $(item)Ritual Stones$().

pages.title: Ritual Mats
pages.notes: Place the Master Ritual Stone down, then place the rest of the blocks using the $(item)Ritual Diviner$() with the $(item)Ritual of Magnetism$() selected.$(br2)When the ritual is constructed, right click the $(item)Master Ritual Stone$() with the $(item)Weak Activation Crystal$() to activate the ritual.

pages.text: Before you can activate the ritual it requires blood sacrifice. Activating this ritual costs $(item)5000LP$() then $(item)50LP$() per block retrieved.$(br2)This cost can only be payed from your personal $(item)Blood Network$(), this is not the same thing as the LP in your $(item)Blood Altar$().$(br2)You can charge your $(item)Blood Network$() by drawing blood with a $(item)Blood Orb$() or by placing your $(item)Blood Orb$() in the altar.

This ritual can have its ranged increased by placing various blocks under the $(item)Master Ritual Stone$(), the default radius is 3 blocks in each cardinal direction centered on the $(item)Master Ritual Stone$().$(br2)The following blocks will work:$(br)$(item)Iron Block$(): will extend the radius to 7 blocks.$(br)$(item)Gold Block$(): will extend the radius to 15.$(br)$(item)Diamond Block$(): will extend the radius to 31.
You could use a dispenser for deploying the $(item)TNT$(), if you place it far enough above the ritual it should be safe from the explosion it produces.
For item collection a simple $(item)Vacuumulator$() will do.
